title: APK signing with Android Studio
desc: Hello,Previously, I had built an app using droidscript and I had have updated it up to its version 2.Now, I have made its version 3 using Android Studio and when now I am going to upload it to the playstore, SHA1 and MD5 keys mis-match issues are coming. And I then tried to use the .keystore file which had been built by droidscript, then Android Studio is showing error of "No such key alias found". I know it is obvious, because droidscript does not make/require any key alias while signing, but Android Studio requires.Is there any other solution for my problem.[Please Note: I will ask you the steps from you to resolve this issue, you do NOT need to work with the code files]Thanks.

title: React Native chat application using Google Firebase
desc: This project is a continuation of an existing project. It is a chat application that uses location data to connect friends that are nearby. I already have the react native library, backend, and mockups created, as well as a working signup flow for iOS. I want this built out for both Andriod and iOS on react native and hosted on Google Firebase, no exceptions.Please do not respond if you do not have experience in React Native and Firebase.Below are the user stories in scope and attached are the low fidelity mockups of the application:- As a user, I can sign up for an account (using name, username, and phone)- As a user, I can upload a photo to my account- As a user, I can sign into my account- As a user, I bulk sync my phone contacts to the new address book- As a user, my geo location is collected and stored from my device every 30 minutes- As a user, the list of contacts within a 30 mile radius of me rise to the top of the contact list- As a user, I can select individual or multiple contacts to send a unified text to

title: Android hotel booking app development
desc: We want to develop hotel booking app which will use 4 3rd party apis to make online bookings.Key Points :a) user open app.b) he can see search box immediatelyc) user make search by inputting destination( Auto complete), check in date, checkout date, no of rooms and passenger with each room and click on the search button.d) app will communicate with four 3rd party api`s(Rest or soap) and get the prices and other info. and apply some % profit on each rooms for each hotels.e) then user will see list of hotels where one image of hotel, address, star rating, cheapest room available price etc..f) user then click on book now button then he can see selected hotel details information with all roomsg) when user choose any room and proceed then he can input passenger information and click on proceed to payment gatewayh) after successful payment, app communicate with 3rd part api and perform the booking and then app will send 2 email , one to user and second to admin which contains selected hotel info and booking reference no.g) there will also be manage booking section where user can see his bookings and cancel any booking via apiPlease do not place fake bid amount. only experience android developer  who have relative experience can apply for this job.

title: Mobile App Development
desc: Looking for a skilled cross-platform mobile application developer. You will develop cross-platform app targeting iOS, Android and potentially web - along with the required back-end services. Our initial preferred technology stack is:1. Front-end development - IONIC 32. Backend services - AWS Mobile Hub stackWe are open to discussing technology if you want to propose a viable technology stack and have convincing reason to use other technology stacks  - for both frontend and backend development.The app and the back-end services will support initially the following basic capabilities:(1) Filter and displayed information  only that the user is eligible for(2)  Display information based on Geographical Location (sorted by closest to user location first)(3) Notification to alert a user profile when new information he/she is eligible for are added or expiring soon. Notification type are editable within the application by the user (to turn on/off all, select/deselect notification types (New, Expiring Soon) and most importantly to edit information Categories he/she wants to be notified for.(4) Search capability for userThe detail specification of front-end and back-end will be shared and discussed with you. The development will be in phases by initially delivering basic functionality listed above and then extended functionality.This job is initially a one time project and then continue with next phase of the development based on the first phase success. This job is for a serious experienced developer with great communication skill - who values long term partnership with us.If you are such a developer, please send your proposal on how you will help us develop this application for our consideration and further discussion.

title: Android app: Show your location and other app user on a mapview.
desc: ------ bids beyond the amount will be rejected--------Note: Both client and server needed.We are a small startup and like to get the following Proof of concept kind of project that is very simple and easy to understand. This is Milestone1 and You will qualify for Milestone 2 if your job is good enough and SIMPLE. You can choose your own UI and crops.The app should show details of OWN and OTHER USERS. (Name, Photo, short description) on a MAP. Any one who logs in will become OWNER and should be able to see OTHER USERS available on the AREA of MAP zoomed in / out.The REFRESH BUTTON needs to refresh all logged in users on the MAP.Requirements:- Native handwritten Android application.- Fresh code and clean understandable code.- User login screen / logout button- Logged in users shown, logged out users not shown.- Settings screen able to upload photo, name, short description.- Show my location (GREEN ICON) and all other USER location. (ORANGE ICON)- map should have zoom in / zoom out feature. The number of users shown has to update upon zoom in or zoom out or refresh button. (no Push notification needed)- All users must be shown on the map. (This will be extensively tested using the app you deliver)Server:- Needs a login screen. Server control panel- We have a domain where you can host and test.- Settings of every user able to store uploaded photo, name, short description.Delivery:- Upon Final delivery acceptance and demo of both Android client and server code the payment will be released.- Do not deliver multiple APKs unless you have a delivery quality.Communication:- Our team of members will be in constant communication using our freelancer chat.------ bids beyond the amount will be rejected--------

title: Hybrid app build - Sporting industry
desc: Scope:An sporting app must be built for both iOS and Android using a hybrid approach. The app has basic form and feed functionality. The choice of framework is at the discretion of the developer but must adhere to the following constraints:●	Must be a widely supported and mature framework i.e. not Angular 1●	Must be sufficiently performant to run on devices as low as iPhone 5 and Samsung 5 galaxyA complete technical specification including UI design, API specifications and app architecture/functionality will be supplied to applicants.Technical Requirements●	The app will require an OS interface between the web app’s JavaScript and native code in order to link notifications to the app. This should be the only native code integration required.●	The web assets such as HTML, JS and CSS should be locally stored on the device and updates to the assets remotely pushable to expedite updating. The alternative approach of hosting the web assets remotely is also acceptable as long as there is a graceful offline mode.●	Facebook signup integration using web●	The resulting web app must be deployable on both iOS and Android, pending integrationThe API driving the app will be provided including documentation surrounding requests and expected JSON responses.This job will be awarded to someone who:●	Can develop the web component as well as integrate it into webviews for at least one of the two platforms (iOS or Android).●	Has extensive experience with API driven app development●	Has extensive experience with web apps and mobile-web frameworks and responsive site developmentLook forward to your bids!

title: BotLibre chatbot - open to bidding
desc: Hi,I need BotLibre master installed ([url removed, login to view]) I have installed Java, installed PostgreSQL database structure and uploaded and decompressed BotLibre master. It's the next stage that I'm stuck on, here are the instructions if you are interested in the work:This is the test component for the Bot Libre AI engine.This directory contains several test classes written in JUnit in Java.The prebuild jar file is in /lib/[url removed, login to view]To build the source code the ant command line build tool is used.You can download ant from, [url removed, login to view]To build run ant, or the [url removed, login to view] file.The project is developed in Eclipse.  There is an Eclipse .project file in the root directory.You can download Eclipse from, [url removed, login to view]This component also includes a standalone GUI that can be used for testing or to create and access a bot instance.To run the GUI run "ant gui" or the [url removed, login to view] file.The AI engine requires a PostgreSQL database.  The default user/password is postgres/password.To change the user/password or database, edit the file, ai-engine/source/META-INF/persistence.xml.You will need to rebuild the [url removed, login to view] and copy it to the ai-engine-test lib directory.To create and initialize the database run "ant initdb" or the [url removed, login to view] file.The Twitter, Facebook, and Freebase support also require developers keys from Twitter, Facebook, and Google.Many thanksStuart
